General.Name: Pudjiadi Prestige Tbk
General.Description: PT Pudjiadi Prestige Tbk engages in the real estate development activities in Indonesia. It operates through Apartement Rental and Real Estate, and Hotel segments. The company develops and sells apartments, offices, shopping centers, shop houses, and hotels. It is also involved in the construction activities; and the rental of space/apartments. In addition, the company owns and operates hotels; and provides building management services. PT Pudjiadi Prestige Tbk was founded in 1980 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia.
